Summary: redish orb like light slowly moving up in the sky
divs: sighting detailsi was on a 4th floor apartment looking east, south east and seen a red\orange round light\orb pulsating and rising in altitude, seems to be going away from me. it wasn't a plane and it was bigger than a star. it reminded me of a signal flare but not as bright as that. it got higher and dimmer and looked like it went into the cloud eventually.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Chilliwack
There were no other sightings in Chilliwack on or around April 15th 2013
